JobFullDesc: Facebook Open Arts builds community through creativity. We offer art-related experiences that invite new ways of thinking about ourselves, our communities, and the world at large. Open Arts offerings, available both online and in-person, include workshops, commissions, residencies, public programming, and design projects.Open Arts Design is dedicated to enriching the Facebook community through the creative process. We create and curate an ongoing body of work, including print and digital projects. Through creative initiatives and collaborations, we amplify a diversity of voices, reflect Facebook culture and values, examine key questions and topics, and engage with varying perspectives from around the world.We are seeking a Communication Designer with experience in both digital and print in a fast-paced and collaborative environment. This role requires creativity, high visual standards, effective communication skills, and a collaborative and can-do attitude. Strong organizational and project management skills are essential. A strong understanding of best practices within digital and motion graphics is a major plus.
